Our Mission

Practical Executive is dedicated promoting the existance and growth of Small Businesses. I believe that the Small Businesses are the answer to many of problems we face, and I hope to help spur your creativity and grow your business so that you can be part of the solution! I believe that focusing on the essentials in any business, it can thrive and grow.

February 10, 2015

Welcome to Jekyll!

You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
